snippet: New York’s longtime police commissioner said little attention had been paid to whether the next administration would continue antiterrorism efforts.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York’s longtime Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly chides mayoral candidates for what he says has been a lack of attention paid to the terror threats facing New York City.
lead_paragraph: New York’s longtime police commissioner said little attention had been paid to whether the next administration would continue antiterrorism efforts.

headline.main: Kelly Says Mayoral Candidates Overlook Terror Threats
headline.print_headline:
Kelly Says Candidates
Overlook Terror Threat
